version_description:
* New alert functionality gives users ability to pick topics they want to be alerted about
* Alerts now deep link to articles, videos and other content
* Spotlight search for easy access to app from search
* New listicle content format
* Fixes to crashing issues in iOS7

* On the road? Now you can listen to News 12 through your car radio or bluetooth speakers
* Picture in picture - Keep watching News 12 while doing any task on your device
* Multitasking in iOS9
* Bug fixes and performance updates
News 12 now supports Apple Watch 2.0 and up

Added sound component to News12 Alerts.
Bug fixes and improvements

This update fixes the issue where number 1 is displaying on the app icon.  Please note that you will still see the number after updating the app, but it will disappear for good when either restarting the app or signing into the app. Thanks for your feedback on this.

Fixed an issue causing iOS 9 users to crash at launch.

This update fixes the issue where number 1 is displaying on the app icon. Please note that you will still see the number after updating the app, but it will disappear for good when either restarting the app or signing into the app. Thanks for your feedback on this.

Now you can view the 36-hour weather forecast directly from the app home screen. If you want to see more, just tap to get the full forecast.

We've also fixed some bugs, and addressed an issue causing crashing on the Apple Watch.

Welcome to the redesigned and upgraded News 12 experience! We update the News 12 app regularly so we can make it better for you. Get the latest version for all of the available features and improvements. Thanks for trusting the News 12 app as your key source for news, weather, traffic, and sports in Long Island, the Bronx, Brooklyn, southwestern Connecticut, Hudson Valley (Rockland and Orange counties), New Jersey, and Westchester.

Hi News12 community! You spoke and we listened! Here are the updates we made for you:
• The Live Broadcasts for News, Weather, and Traffic are at the top of the Homepage
• We've made fixes to the login experience - sorry to everybody that experienced issues! We're continuing to monitor and fix issues as we catch them!

Please email news-app-support@franklyinc.com if you're still seeing issues so we can squash these bugs more quickly.

* Bug fixes
* Look for new push notification options in Settings to turn on traffic and transit alerts for your area!

NEW in this version:
• Some improvements to viewing Photos and Slideshows in Stories
• Many bug fixes and under-the-hood performance improvements

NEW in this update:
• Lots of bug fixes
• Now you can access Weather from the Homepage
• Some great, new content categories

NEW in this version:
• You no longer have to log in to access app content! Only watching live feeds requires logging in with your existing account
• Check out the new content categories on your home page and in the side menu
• Some bug fixes and performance improvements
